R

reinforce() - Method in class model.IntermediateAIPlayer
 
reinforceArmies(Territory, Territory) - Method in class model.HumanPlayer
 
reinforceArmies(Territory, Territory) - Method in class model.IntermediateAIPlayer
 
reinforceArmies(Territory, Territory) - Method in class model.Player
For iteration 2, at the end of turn, player is allowed to reinforce by pulling armies from one country and placing them in another country
reinforceArmies(Territory, Territory) - Method in class model.SimpleAIPlayer
Not used in iteration 1
RiskController - Class in controller
Controls the game of Risk, as the name suggests.
RiskController(ArrayList<Player>) - Constructor for class controller.RiskController
Constructs a new RiskController object from a given ArrayList.
RiskGUI - Class in view
 
RiskGUI() - Constructor for class view.RiskGUI
 
rollDice() - Method in class model.Dice
rolls a die
rollDice() - Method in class model.Player
used to roll dice for the purpose of attacking territories
Run6Bots - Class in controller
This class tests RiskController by running 1000 games among SimpleAIPlayers and IntermediateAIPlayers, and reporting the number of winners for each type of AI.
Run6Bots() - Constructor for class controller.Run6Bots
Constructs a new Run6Bots, reads in the number and type of players from the command line, and reports the percentages of wins for each type of player.
